sense.def: Pathological Condition of tai yang zhong feng 太陽中風 , wind stroke in the major yang [conduits], with fever, irritation and thirst, and if one drinks water/liquid it is immediately thrown up again. Shang han lun 傷寒論 74: 中風，發熱六七日不解而煩，有表裏證， 渴欲飲水，水入則吐者，名曰水逆，五苓散主之 , “If one is struck by wind and has had unending effusion of heat for six, seven days, as well as vexation, with pathological signs internally and externally, and if he is thirsty and wishes to drink water, with the water consumed being thrown up again, then this is called water counterflow . The powder with wu ling controls it”.
